message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a steal for a product worth so much to you!  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is $800000 to you, but based on my budget, I am only able to offer $950000. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $975000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this deal happen!
